column3: No. of colonies going into winter
column4: Overall no. of colonies lost (dead colonies and colonies lost due to queen problems)
column6: 95% confidence interval for overall winter loss rate. Lower limit
column7: 95% confidence interval for overall winter loss rate. Upper limit
column8: Estimated no. of beekeepers in country in 2015
